trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell cmdlet

trans-unit.source: Register-WmiEvent
trans-unit.target: Register-wmievent

trans-unit.source: Register-WmiEvent
trans-unit.target: Register-wmievent

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 简述

trans-unit.source: Subscribes to a Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) event.
trans-unit.target: 订阅 Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) 事件。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 语法

trans-unit.source: class (Default)
trans-unit.target: 类 （默认值）

trans-unit.source: query
trans-unit.target: 查询

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: The **Register-WmiEvent** cmdlet subscribes to Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) events on the local computer or on a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: **Register-wmievent** cmdlet 订阅本地计算机上或远程计算机上的 Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) 事件。

trans-unit.source: When the subscribed WMI event is raised, it is added to the event queue in your local session even if the event occurs on a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 当引发订阅的 WMI 事件时，会将该事件添加到本地会话的事件队列中，即使该事件是在远程计算机上发生的也是如此。

trans-unit.source: To get events in the event queue, use the Get-Eventcmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取事件队列中的事件，请使用 Get Eventcmdlet。

trans-unit.source: You can use the parameters of **Register-WmiEvent** to subscribe to events on remote computers and to specify the property values of the events that can help you identify the event in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用的参数 **Register-wmievent** 订阅远程计算机上的事件并指定该属性可帮助您的事件的值用于标识队列中的事件。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the *Action* parameter to specify actions to take when a subscribed event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以使用 *操作* 参数来指定引发订阅的事件时要执行的操作。

trans-unit.source: When you subscribe to an event, an event subscriber is added to your session.
trans-unit.target: 订阅事件时，会向会话中添加一个事件订阅服务器。

trans-unit.source: To get the event subscribers in the session, use the Get-EventSubscriber cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取会话中的事件订阅服务器，请使用 Get-EventSubscriber cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: To cancel the subscription, use the Unregister-Event cmdlet, which deletes the event subscriber from the session.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消订阅，请使用 Unregister-Event cmdlet，该 cmdlet 将从会话中删除事件订阅服务器。

trans-unit.source: New Common Information Model (CIM) cmdlets, introduced Windows PowerShell 3.0, perform the same tasks as the WMI cmdlets.
trans-unit.target: 新的通用信息模型 (CIM) cmdlet，引入了 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中，执行与 WMI cmdlet 相同的任务。

trans-unit.source: The CIM cmdlets comply with WS-Management (WSMan) standards and with the CIM standard, which enables the cmdlets to use the same techniques to manage computers that run the Windows operating system and those that run other operating systems.
trans-unit.target: CIM cmdlet 符合 Ws-management (WSMan) 标准和 CIM 标准，从而使得这些 cmdlet，可以使用相同技术来管理运行 Windows 操作系统的系统以及运行其他操作系统的计算机。

trans-unit.source: Instead of using **Register-WmiEvent**, consider using the Register-CimIndicationEventhttp://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=227960 cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 而不是使用 **Register-wmievent**, ，请考虑使用寄存器 CimIndicationEventhttp://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=227960 cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 示例

trans-unit.source: Example 1: Subscribe to events generated by a class
trans-unit.target: 示例 1︰ 订阅由类所生成的事件

trans-unit.source: This command subscribes to the events generated by the **Win32_ProcessStartTrace** class.
trans-unit.target: 此命令订阅由生成的事件 **Win32_ProcessStartTrace** 类。

trans-unit.source: This class raises an event whenever a process starts.
trans-unit.target: 只要进程启动，此类就会引发一个事件。

trans-unit.source: Example 2: Subscribe to creation events for a process
trans-unit.target: 示例 2︰ 创建进程的事件订阅

trans-unit.source: This command uses a query to subscribe to Win32_process instance creation events.
trans-unit.target: 此命令使用一个查询订阅 Win32_process 实例创建事件。

trans-unit.source: Example 3: Use an action to respond to an event
trans-unit.target: 示例 3︰ 使用操作来响应事件

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to use an action to respond to an event.
trans-unit.target: 此示例说明如何使用操作来响应事件。

trans-unit.source: In this case, when a process starts, any Start-Process commands in the current session are written to an XML file.
trans-unit.target: 在本例中，当进程启动时，当前会话中的任何 Start-Process 命令都会写入一个 XML 文件中。

trans-unit.source: When you use the *Action* parameter, **Register-WmiEvent** returns a background job that represents the event action.
trans-unit.target: 当您使用 *操作* 参数， **Register-wmievent** 返回表示事件操作的后台作业。

trans-unit.source: You can use the **Job** cmdlets, such as Get-Job and Receive-Job, to manage the event job.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 **作业** cmdlet，例如 Get-job 和 Receive-job，来管理事件作业。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Jobs.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_Jobs。

trans-unit.source: Example 4: Register for events on a remote computer
trans-unit.target: 示例 4︰ 注册远程计算机上的事件

trans-unit.source: This example registers for events on the Server01 remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 此示例注册远程计算机 Server01 上的事件。

trans-unit.source: WMI returns the events to the local computer and stores them in the event queue in the current session.
trans-unit.target: WMI 将这些事件返回到本地计算机并将其存储在当前会话的事件队列中。

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the events, run a local **Get-Event** command.
trans-unit.target: 若要检索这些事件，请运行本地 **Get-event** 命令。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: -Action
trans-unit.target: -操作

trans-unit.source: Specifies commands that handle the events.
trans-unit.target: 指定用于处理事件的命令。

trans-unit.source: The commands in the *Action* parameter run when an event is raised instead of sending the event to the event queue.
trans-unit.target: 中的命令 *操作* 参数运行时引发事件而不是将事件发送到事件队列。

trans-unit.source: Enclose the commands in braces ( { } ) to create a script block.
trans-unit.target: 用大括号 ({ }) 括起命令以形成脚本块。

trans-unit.source: The value of *Action* can include the $Event, $EventSubscriber, $Sender, $EventArgs, and $Args automatic variables, which provide information about the event to the *Action* script block.
trans-unit.target: 值 *操作* $Event、 $EventSubscriber、 $Sender、 $EventArgs 和 $Args 自动变量，提供有关的事件的信息可以包括 *操作* 脚本块。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Automatic_Variables.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_Automatic_Variables。

trans-unit.source: When you specify an action, **Register-WmiEvent** returns an event job object that represents that action.
trans-unit.target: 当您指定了操作 **Register-wmievent** 返回一个表示该操作的事件作业对象。

trans-unit.source: You can use the cmdlets that contain the **Job** noun (the **Job** cmdlets) to manage the event job.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用包含的 cmdlet **作业** 名词 ( **作业** cmdlet) 来管理事件作业。

trans-unit.source: -Class
trans-unit.target: 类

trans-unit.source: Specifies the event to which you are subscribing.
trans-unit.target: 指定要订阅的事件。

trans-unit.source: Enter the WMI class that generates the events.
trans-unit.target: 请输入用于生成这些事件的 WMI 类。

trans-unit.source: A *Class* or *Query* parameter is required in every command.
trans-unit.target: 一个 *类* 或 *查询* 参数必需的每个命令中。

trans-unit.source: -ComputerName
trans-unit.target: -ComputerName

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the computer on which the command runs.
trans-unit.target: 指定运行该命令的计算机的名称。

trans-unit.source: The default is the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为本地计算机。

trans-unit.source: Type the NetBIOS name, an IP address, or a fully qualified domain name of the computer.
trans-unit.target: 键入计算机的 NetBIOS 名称、IP 地址或完全限定的域名。

trans-unit.source: To specify the local computer, type the computer name, a dot (.), or localhost.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定本地计算机，请键入计算机名称、 句点 （.） 或 localhost。

trans-unit.source: This parameter does not rely on Windows PowerShell remoting.
trans-unit.target: 此参数不依赖于 Windows PowerShell 远程处理。

trans-unit.source: You can use the *ComputerName* parameter even if your computer is not configured to run remote commands.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 *ComputerName* 即使您的计算机未配置为运行远程命令的参数。

trans-unit.source: -Credential
trans-unit.target: -Credential

trans-unit.source: Specifies a user account that has permission to perform this action.
trans-unit.target: 指定有权执行此操作的用户帐户。

trans-unit.source: The default is the current user.
trans-unit.target: 默认为当前用户。

trans-unit.source: Type a user name, such as User01 or Domain01\User01, or enter a **PSCredential** object, such as one generated by the Get-Credential cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 键入用户名，例如 User01 或 Domain01\User01，或输入 **PSCredential** 对象，例如由 Get-credential cmdlet 生成。

trans-unit.source: If you type a user name, this cmdlet prompts you for a password.
trans-unit.target: 如果键入用户名，则此 cmdlet 会提示您输入密码。

trans-unit.source: -Forward
trans-unit.target: 转发

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet sends events for this subscription to the session on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 指示此 cmdlet 将此订阅的事件发送到本地计算机上的会话。

trans-unit.source: Use this parameter when you are registering for events on a remote computer or in a remote session.
trans-unit.target: 如果要在远程计算机或远程会话中注册事件，可使用此参数。

trans-unit.source: -MaxTriggerCount
trans-unit.target: -MaxTriggerCount

trans-unit.source: Specifies the maximum trigger count.
trans-unit.target: 指定的最大触发器计数。

trans-unit.source: -MessageData
trans-unit.target: -MessageData

trans-unit.source: Specifies any additional data to be associated with this event subscription.
trans-unit.target: 指定将与此事件订阅关联的任何额外数据。

trans-unit.source: The value of this parameter appears in the **MessageData** property of all events associated with this subscription.
trans-unit.target: 此参数的值将出现在 **MessageData** 属性与此订阅关联的所有事件。

trans-unit.source: -Namespace
trans-unit.target: -Namespace

trans-unit.source: Specifies the namespace of the WMI class.
trans-unit.target: 指定 WMI 类的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: -Query
trans-unit.target: 查询

trans-unit.source: Specifies a query in WMI Query Language (WQL) that identifies the WMI event class, such as: `select * from __InstanceDeletionEvent`.
trans-unit.target: 指定的查询在 WMI 查询语言 (WQL)，标识 WMI 事件类，如︰ `select * from __InstanceDeletionEvent`。

trans-unit.source: -SourceIdentifier
trans-unit.target: -SourceIdentifier

trans-unit.source: Specifies a name that you select for the subscription.
trans-unit.target: 指定你为订阅选择的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name that you select must be unique in the current session.
trans-unit.target: 你选择的名称必须在当前会话中唯一。

trans-unit.source: The default value is the GUID that Windows PowerShell assigns.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 Windows PowerShell 指定的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: The value of this parameter appears in the value of the **SourceIdentifier** property of the subscriber object and of all event objects associated with this subscription.
trans-unit.target: 此参数的值显示的值中 **SourceIdentifier** 订阅服务器对象以及与此订阅关联的所有事件对象的属性。

trans-unit.source: -SupportEvent
trans-unit.target: -SupportEvent

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet hides the event subscription.
trans-unit.target: 指示此 cmdlet 会隐藏事件订阅。

trans-unit.source: Use this parameter when the current subscription is part of a more complex event registration mechanism and it should not be discovered independently.
trans-unit.target: 在当前订阅是更复杂的事件注册机制的一部分并且不应单独发现时，可使用此参数。

trans-unit.source: To view or cancel a subscription that was created by using the *SupportEvent* parameter, specify the *Force* parameter of the Get-EventSubscriber and Unregister-Event cmdlets.
trans-unit.target: 若要查看或取消订阅已通过使用 *SupportEvent* 参数，指定 *强制* Get-eventsubscriber 和 Unregister-event cmdlet 的参数。

trans-unit.source: -Timeout
trans-unit.target: 超时

trans-unit.source: Specifies how long Windows PowerShell waits for this command to finish.
trans-unit.target: 指定 Windows PowerShell 等待此命令完成的时间长度。

trans-unit.source: The default value, 0 (zero), means that there is no time-out, and it causes Windows PowerShell to wait indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0（零），表示没有超时，这将导致 Windows PowerShell 无限期地等待。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 支持以下常见参数:-调试-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction、-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 和-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输入

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: You cannot pipe objects to this cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 不能通过管道将对象传递给此 cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输出

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet does not generate any output.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 将不生成任何输出。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: To use this cmdlet in Windows Vista or a later version of the Windows operating system, start Windows PowerShell by using the Run as administrator option.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此 cmdlet 在 Windows Vista 或更高版本的 Windows 操作系统，请使用运行以管理员身份选项启动 Windows PowerShell。

trans-unit.source: Events, event subscriptions, and the event queue exist only in the current session.
trans-unit.target: 事件、事件订阅和事件队列仅存在于当前会话中。

trans-unit.source: If you close the current session, the event queue is discarded and the event subscription is canceled.
trans-unit.target: 如果关闭当前会话，将丢弃事件队列并取消事件订阅。

trans-unit.source: RELATED LINKS
trans-unit.target: 相关的链接
